name: Minecraft Backup Program
body:
### About
[MBP](https://github.com/HafisCZ/HafisCZ.github.io/blob/master/images/image0.JPG) is program writed by **HafisCZ**. This program serves as a backup manager, primarily for **Minecraft**. It includes the ability to backup any folder to a _.zip_ file, restore the folder from a backup and backup management. 

You you have any tips & ideas, or you want to report error, send me an [e-mail](mailto:mar00m@seznam.cz).

### Features
- Manual backup creation & use
- Backup management, Rename & Remove
- Automatic backup creation with split modified by user (Max. 23 hours & 59 minutes)

### Planned features
- Access to the user's cloud - Uploading, Downloading and Synchronizing

### Links
* [Direct Download](https://github.com/HafisCZ/MinecraftAutoBackupProgram/blob/master/Minecraft%20Backup%20Utility.jar?raw=true)
* [Minecraft](http://www.minecraft.net)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
